ministry: Government of Karnataka - Women and Child Development Department
description: Monthly financial assistance of ₹2,000 to woman head of the family for economic independence.
target_beneficiaries: Families from both BPL and APL categories

other_conditions: Applicant must be declared as woman head of the family
Husband or woman head should NOT be GST or income taxpayers
95% low-income women beneficiaries reported better nutrition

required_documents: Declaration of woman head of family

steps: Submit bank account and Aadhaar details
